item.title: Two way data bindings in Reagent
item.author: gonzih@gmail.com (Max Gonzih)
item.description: Small code snippet showing ability to generate 2 way data bindings in Reagent. Underneath it’s all about core.async. Also provides ability to apply transformation using transducers.
